DOC.brief_title: A Dose Range Finding Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety AZD9668 Administered Orally Three Dose Levels Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Treatment With Tiotropium
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis COPD symptom 1 year Smokers exsmokers Males postmenopausal females 40 80 year old Able use electronic device Past history current evidence clinically significant heart disease Current diagnosis asthma Patients require long term oxygen therapy Treatment antibiotic within 4 week study visit 1b
